#define NEGATE_CASE (   FORMAT,
  T 
)
Value:
case FORMAT: { \
    vil_image_view<T> view = imgr->get_copy_view(); \
    T mxv = vcl_numeric_limits<T>::max(); \
    vil_math_scale_and_offset_values(view, -1.0, mxv); \
    outr = vil_new_image_resource_of_view(view);  \
    break; \
                }
